title: Client stuck on Game in Progress after game ended.
body:
Hi there,

My client keeps trying to reconnect me to a game that was played earlier today, every time i relaunch the client it instantly tries to load back into that game.

I cannot try and create another game or anything as i just have a reconnect button..

Can someone help me fix this please!

replies.body: This can happen if our servers are delayed in receiving notice that the match has ended.  This can usually resolve on its own or a relog!
